title: COVID-19 Vaccine Requirement for Faculty and Staff
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccine Requirement for Faculty and Staff COVID-19 Vaccination Policy The best ways to protect yourself and others against severe COVID-19 infections is to stay up to date with [COVID-19 vaccines](https://www.mass.gov/covid-19-vaccine), wear a mask in crowded, indoor spaces, and test if you are not feeling well. We will be transitioning from a University COVID-19 vaccination mandate to a tiered vaccination policy. - COVID-19 General Population Vaccination Policy: We strongly recommend that everyone remain up to date with all [CDC COVID-19 vaccination recommendations](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/stay-up-to-date.html). - COVID-19 Clinical Population Vaccination Policy: All faculty, students, and staff who provide direct patient-facing healthcare will be required to provide documentation of: - The original primary series and monovalent booster OR - a primary series and a bivalent booster OR - a single bivalent mRNA booster OR - submit a religious or medical waiver. - For instructions on how to upload your vaccination documentation, please
